title: Nearly one million customers without power as southeast utilities respond to Winter Storm Fern
description: Utilities across the southeastern United States are racing to restore power to nearly 1 million customers left in the cold after Winter Storm Fern.
content: Utilities across the southeastern United States are racing to restore power to nearly 1 million customers left in the cold after Winter Storm Fern.
